snippet: His new album, “Old Boots, New Dirt,” bows at No. 1 with 278,000 copies sold in the United States, the third-largest opening-week number of 2014 so far.
abstract: His new album, “Old Boots, New Dirt,” bows at No. 1 with 278,000 copies sold in the United States, the third-largest opening-week number of 2014 so far.

headline.print_headline: Aldean’s ‘Old Boots’ Saunters to Top of Chart
